= Installation =

== Guide ==

 * Download projekt from our repository or from this [http://code.google.com/p/java-cv-generator/jarvan.zip] 
 * Copy the folder to Apache Tomcat or other apache system
 * Open webpage http://localhost/Jarvan
 * Enjoy


== Requirents ==

 * Apache Tomcat 7 or other apache system
 * >= Java 6.0, Java Web
 * texlive
 * currvita //latex package
